data.persona: I am a parishioner of the church in the village.  The bishop speaks at the church once a week.  I go to the church to pray several times a week.
data.description:
You are in the Church Entryway.
The church has marble floors and a huge frost window. There are benches made from wood and a big organ can be seen at the front stage. There is gold trim all around the church.
There's a frost window, a big organ, a huge frost window, a window, a gold trim, a Altar, a A cross, a stage, and a bench here.
The preacher and the priest are here.

You are carrying a Cross.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the priest to show him I'm friendly.
data.long_motivation: I want God to watch over me in life.
